author: Epic Games
description:
The action-RPG video game is the sequel to the cult classic Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 lets players step into its story through two distinct, alternating perspectives: Elder vampire Phyre and Malkavian detective Fabien. 

Pre-purchase now: https://epic.gm/vtm-bloodlines2

Today, we bring you a new glimpse into The Clan of the Hunt. Meet the Banu Haqim characters of Seattle and see Phyre's judgment in action. 

Banu Haqim starts with "Celerity", "Blood Sorcery", and "Obfuscate" as clan affinities, and "Silence of Death: All your actions become entirely silent for a period after feeding" as the passive ability. Then, as the game progresses, you'll be able to unlock the following Banu Haqim disciplines: 

"Bladed Hand": Slash swiftly in front of you, beheading weaker opponents. 
"Split Second": Move so fast that time appears to stop around you. 
"Mute": Silence your target's screams and weapons. 
"Unseen Aura": Become temporarily invisibl
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 | Banu Clan Trailer
